artefact.overview: You don't need to tell DVLA if you have HIV
artefact.body: You don’t need to tell DVLA if you have HIV.

artefact.title: Driving with a disability or a health condition

details.description: Information about medical conditions that affect your ability to drive

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
